attributes.action: authorise contruction of a memorial to the railway workers (men and women) who served during the Second World War
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The work of the men and women of Britain who worked on the railways during the last World War is often overlooked, but arguably kept Britain moving. It's only right these brave individuals have a memorial in London like the other services. Without these people, Britain could not have won the war.
